bibl.title: Two New Ethnics in Ptolemaic Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. V.B.P. IV, 47. Reads the ethnic MÊndiow in line 8, restores the date (24 May 127 B.C.) and translates lines 4-22. - 2. P.U.G. III, 119. The word following Sokrates in line 12 is an ethnic, e.g. Ku[rhna›ow]. Aﬁak[ide]Êw in line 14 should be an ethnic or demotic. <Mundios, Ku[renaios], Aiak[ide]us>
bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, Two New Ethnics in Ptolemaic Papyri.
